customer_name: The Sugar Bear Adoption L L C
site_name: THE SUGAR BEAR ADOPTION L L C
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This is the 1st pre license for a Class B license. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the AWA.
Identification and Record keeping requirements were explained to the applicant. 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
